name: Word Swipe
summary: If you like solving various puzzles and are looking for a new and exciting online game, welcome to Word Swipe. On the screen in front of you will be a playing field divided into equal number of cells and filled with letters of English alphabet. Your task is to clear the field of letters. To do this you need to look carefully through the field and find the letters next to each other, which can form a word. Then simply connect these letters with a line using your mouse. As soon as you do this, these letters will disappear from the playing field and you will get points. Thus, solving puzzles and guessing words, you will gradually clear the field of letters.
